text: Larry Logan Warner (April 12, 1945 - Febraury 1, 2022) was an American lawyer and politician. Warner was born in Washington, D.C.. He spent his life in Harlingen, Texas. Warner was in the Texas House of Representatives from 1987 to 1991. He was a Democrat. Warner died on February 1, 2022 in Harlingen at the age of 76.Larry Logan Warner-obituaryLegislative Reference Library-Larry Warner ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Members of the Texas Legislature Category:Politicians from Washington, D.C. title: Larry Warner
